Name: 별에게 소원을 (When you wish upon a star)
About the game: 'When you wish upon a star' is a visual Nobel that develops stories based on the player's choice! 1) All three charming heroes are in full voices! 2) A4 500+ pages scenario volume (playtime: 10 hours) 3) More than 20 beautiful CG, 13 exciting OSTs, 4) Various options! There are three stories prepared! 5) Multi-endings according to your choices, collect keywords for good ending.
